tooltip.content:
The client portal is still in the alpha phase. 
It should not be used publicly yet, but can be tested. 
In order to make the feature as good as possible, we would be happy to receive your feedback.

block.description: Please confirm the blocking of {customerName}. The client will then no longer have access. This can be reversed at any time.
block.title: Block client

unblock.description: Please confirm the unblocking of {customerName}. The client will have access again.
unblock.title: Unblock client

success.content: Invitation email could not be sent
success.title: Error

send-email.label: Inform the client via email about portal access

deactivated.content: The portal is deactivated and all access is blocked. The portal can be reactivated in the <link>settings</link>.
deactivated.title: Client portal deactivated

dialog.description: Please confirm the deletion of {customerName}. The client and all data associated with it will be irrevocably deleted.
dialog.title: Delete client

info.content: Please make sure to inform the client about the changed credentials. This can be done automatically by checking the email option.
info.title: Client notification

send-email.label: Inform the client via email about the changed credentials

dialog.description: A new client can be created here.

success-with-portal.content: {name} was successfully created and the invitation link copied to your clipboard
success-with-portal.title: Success

dialog.title: New client

e-mail_taken.content: The desired email address is already taken.
e-mail_taken.title: Email address already taken

not-configured.description: The client portal must be activated and configured before clients can be added.
not-configured.title: Client portal not active

tasks.description:
In the future there will be an overview of open tasks in this client's sessions. 
Tasks can be created within an application and are then displayed here.
tasks.title: Open Tasks

notification.content:
You didn't allow us to access your clipboard. 
Please adjust the permissions in your browser or copy the link manually.
notification.title: Copying not possible

credits.help-tooltip: Credits allow you to restrict the number of sessions a user can have for this tree. Credits can be adjusted later by sharing the tree again.

help-tooltip.content: Mioto applications are interactive forms that are created as decision trees. They accept user input and generate output based on the rules and conditions defined in the decision tree.
help-tooltip.title: Applications

invalid-file.content: The provided file is not valid.
invalid-file.title: Invalid file

broken-file.content: We are sorry that this error has occurred. Your data is not lost. Please contact us to try a manual recovery.
broken-file.title: The opened file contains errors that could not be reset automatically.

connection-paused.title: The connection to the server has been paused.

unauthorized.title: You are not authorized to edit this application.

circular_connection.long: A connection between these blocks would result in a circular connection.

connected_to_self.long: A block cannot be connected to itself.

duplicate_edge.long: A connection between these blocks already exists.

alpha-badge.description: Mioto Mind is still at a very early stage of development. Errors may occur. Please help us to improve Mioto Mind with your feedback.
alpha-badge.title: Mioto Mind in the alpha phase

initial-message.content: Hello, how can I help you with Mioto?

not-found.content: There is no application with this id. Please check if the url is correct. If you think the url is correct but still can't find an application, please contact us.
not-found.title: Application not found

menu-button.disabled: A start block is required to open the preview.

help-tooltip.content: The session data can be saved to check the generated variables and the resulting path.
help-tooltip.title: Session storage

unknown-error.content:
An unknown error has occurred. 
We have been informed and are working on a solution. 
You can try resetting the session to solve the problem.
unknown-error.title: Unknown Error

demo.tooltip:
Testing the portal allows you to use it like a portal user without having your own portal account. 
You can configure the available applications in the settings.

unknown-error.content: The background could not be uploaded.
unknown-error.title: Error

client-portal.description: The client portal gives your clients access to your digital law firm.

alert.description: If you deactivate the client portal, the accesses of all your clients will be blocked. No data will be deleted and all access will be unlocked again if reactivated.
alert.label: Deactivate client portal

theming.description: The portal is whitelabelled. That means that you can configure your theme, logo and other assets to give the portal your branding. If you do not configure anything the normal Mioto theme is used and in place of a Logo we use the first letters of the first two words of your organization name.
theming.title: Theming

client-portal.title: Client portal

additionalMessage.content: The deletion of your account cannot be undone.
additionalMessage.title: Attention!

verifyOverlay.description: Please verify to delete your account.

unknown-error.content: The logo could not be uploaded.
unknown-error.title: Error

help-tooltip.content:
The data protection declaration for your portal. 
These are displayed to clients for confirmation upon registration.
help-tooltip.title: Privacy policy of the portal

unknown-error.content: The privacy policy could not be uploaded.
unknown-error.title: Mistake

help-tooltip.content:
The terms and conditions for your portal. These are displayed to clients for confirmation upon registration.



Can be provided as a URL or file.
help-tooltip.title: Terms and conditions of the portal

unknown-error.content: The terms and conditions could not be uploaded.
unknown-error.title: Error

dialog.content: Are you sure you want to delete the Theme <weak>{themeName}</weak>?
dialog.heading: Delete Theme

invalid.error: The theme cannot be uploaded because it does not meet the requirements.

success.content: The theme has been uploaded successfully
success.title: Success

name.label: Theme name
name.required: Please enter a name for the new theme.

help-tooltip.content: Themes allow you to customize the portal and applications to your organization's brand.
help-tooltip.title: Explanation of themes

create-org.description:
Since your account was created before 04.12.2023 you have to configure your organization.

Since 04.12.2023 organizations are available in Mioto. Organizations will allow you to group multiple users and make it easier to share, edit and run applications.

name.description: The name of your organization is used in various places in Mioto to make your organization identifiable to users.

required.message: Please enter a name for your organization.

name.heading: Name
name.label: Organization name

slug.description:
The URL of your organization represents your space in Mioto. It is part of your branding and allows you to differentiate your links from those of other organizations.

Please note that the URL cannot be changed.

allowed-characters.message: Please use only letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.

required.message: Please enter a URL for your organization.

slug-taken.message: The requested URL is already taken. Please choose another one.

slug.label:
Organization URL

(permitted characters: letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores)
slug.title: URL

create-org.title: Create organization

error.content: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again. If the error still occurs, please contact support.

forgotPassword.description: Please enter the e-mail address you used to register with Mioto.

login.description: Start creating your personal automation tools in just a few moments.

errors.incorrect_email_or_password: You have entered an incorrect e-mail address or password.
errors.user_blocked: Your account has been blocked. Please contact your law firm.

maintenance.description: Mioto is currently in maintenance mode.

cta-meet.cta: Are you interested in Mioto? Schedule a chat here.

access-form.description: Are you already one of the first users? Then enter your access code here.

errors.access_code_not_found: The access password could not be found.

register-form.description: Start creating your personal automation tools in just a few moments.

error.already_used: The e-mail address is already taken.

alphaDisclaimer.label: I have taken note that the software is in an early development phase and that error-free operation cannot be guaranteed.

Your account has been banned.

required.errorMessage: This field must be filled in.

terms.label: I have read and accept the general <link>terms and conditions</link>.

error.content:
Unfortunately the application could not be started. 
Please contact the operator.
error.title: Error

popover.content:
We are pleased that you are using Mioto. Please note that the software is currently still in the beta phase.

If you encounter any problems, have any questions or simply want to let us know what you think, please use the contact form. We look forward to your feedback!
popover.heading: Mioto in the beta phase

errors.email_already_used: The desired email address is already taken.

errors.weak_password:
Please create a more complex password. 
It must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number and one special character.

email.label: Your e-mail
email.required: Please enter your e-mail address so that we can reply to you.

message.label: Your message
message.required: We can't help you without a message.

unknown.content: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again later.
unknown.title: Error

deleteTreeDialog.description: Please enter the name of the application: <weak>{treeName}</weak> to confirm the deletion.
deleteTreeDialog.title: Delete application

error-card.assurance: Don't worry, your data is stored and secure.
error-card.description: Unfortunately Mioto is not working as it should. We are already working on fixing the error.
error-card.title: Something has gone wrong

new-password.required: This field must be filled in.
new-password.weak_password: Your password is too weak. Click the strength indicator on the right for tips on how to create a strong password.

popover.description: These are tips to strengthen your password. These are not mandatory rules. You only need to reach a strength level of 3.
popover.title: Tips

tipps.3: Mixture of upper and lower case letters

no-store.tooltip: Your application has not been fully saved on the server. A version can only be created after the full transmition.

missing_tree_document.content: The version could not be created because the application does not contain any content.
missing_tree_document.title: Error

missing_tree_start_node.content: The version could not be created because the application does not contain a start block.
missing_tree_start_node.title: Error

unknown.content: An error has occurred during the creation of the version. We have been informed and will fix it as soon as possible.
unknown.title: Error

success.content: A version has been successfully created.
success.title: Version created

unknown.content: The exported file is not valid. It cannot be imported again. Please contact support to restore it.
unknown.title: Invalid file

reason.tooltip: Create a version to share this app

intro.content: To integrate images, you can either enter an image URL or upload a file.
intro.heading: How should images be integrated?

upload.content: For images that are only relevant in your Mioto application, you can upload the image directly and we will save it for you.
upload.heading: Upload Image

url.content: If the image is already available somewhere online (e.g. hosted on your website), it may make sense to just use the URL to make it easier to update the image everywhere.
url.heading: Image URL

cursiv.tooltip: Highlight the selected text in italics

heading.tooltip: Convert the selected text to a heading

paragraph.tooltip: Convert the selected text to a paragraph

tooltip.description:
To improve the editor workflow, we have introduced a new menu. 
This can be opened directly in the editor by typing "/". 
This menu will replace the toolbar.

extended-descriptions.file-variable: To access the file variables select the menu item File Download Link, File Preview or type "file:" after "/".
extended-descriptions.rich-text-variable: To access the formatted variables, select the Formatted Text menu item or type "rich-text" after "/".
extended-descriptions.variable: To access the variables, select the Variables menu item or type "@" after "/".

tooltip.title: Slash Menu

variable-invalid-type.tooltip:
{variableName} is now only available as {variableType}. 
Please delete this variable and add it again.

added-data.description: To facilitate troubleshooting, we automatically attach the following data to the support request. If you do not agree to this, please contact us via the general support form.
added-data.title: Automatically added data

email.label: Your e-mail
email.required: Please enter your e-mail address so that we can reply to you.

message.label: Your message
message.required: We can't help you without a message.

supportDialog.success: Thank you for your request. We will get back to you as soon as possible. The dialog can now be closed.
supportDialog.title: Contact support

tree-name-input.label: Application name
tree-name-input.length: Please choose a shorter name for your application. A maximum of {treeNameMaxLength} characters is allowed.

info.content: Mioto is currently in maintenance mode.
info.title: Maintenance
info.until: This is expected to end at {time}.

mioto-mind.system-prompt: You are a highly-trained, precise top legal professional

analyze-risks.description: Use this for anything related to risks.

question.description: The exact question asked by the user.

info.title: Oops, where did the page go?

dialog.heading: Are you sure you want to delete the blocks?

readable-input.disabled: Variable no longer available (click to delete)

info.content:
This is an end block. 
The connections have no effect.
info.title: Inactive

help-tooltip.content:
Connections control the transitions between blocks. 
They contain conditions that determine when they are activated. 
If several conditions apply, the first in the list is used.
help-tooltip.title: Connections

help-tooltip.content:
This feature allows you to define complex conditions in your decision tree by chaining conditions together. 
'And' means that all conditions chained with 'And' must be met in order to continue the corresponding path. 
'Or' means that at least one of the conditions must be met to continue.
help-tooltip.title: Concatenations

help-tooltip.content: Conditions represent the rules under which a specific connection between the blocks is controlled.
help-tooltip.title: Conditions

badge.title: Direct connection
badge.tooltip: Conditions have no effect in the direct connection.

fallback-edge.title: Fallback
fallback-edge.tooltip: If no condition applies, the fallback connection is activated.

help-tooltip.content: With a fallback connection, conditions have no effect.
help-tooltip.title: Fallback connections

list.aria-label: Select the block type you want

deleteNode.disabledForStartNodeLabel: The starting block cannot be removed.
deleteNode.label: Delete block

error.duplicate:
warning__The block name is already taken. 
We recommend unique names to make blocks easier to find.
error.too_long: A block name can be a maximum of 70 characters long.

formatting-instructions.help-tooltip: Tell the AI how the response should be formatted. E.g. "Give the answer in one sentence." or "Give the answer with explanations."
formatting-instructions.label: Format description
formatting-instructions.placeholder: Describe how the result should be formatted.

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: The name for the extracted variable

date.content: Date calculations allow you to add or subtract a number of days, business days, weeks, months or years to a date. The output will be a date variable.
date.heading: Dates

date-difference.content: A date difference calculation gives you the difference between two dates in days, business days, weeks, months or years. The output will be a number variable.
date-difference.heading: Date Difference

numbers.content: Number calculations are exactly what you expect. They allow you to enter a formular that will be calculated and output a number as a variable.
numbers.heading: Numbers

alpha-disclaimer.tooltip: PDF generation is still in Alpha. That means it should only be tested and not used in a published application. Please send bug reports or feedback to support@mioto.app.

invalid_file_type.content: The file is not in the correct format and therefore cannot be uploaded.
invalid_file_type.title: Invalid file type

size_too_large.content: File exceeds the maximum size of 15MB
size_too_large.title: File too large

error.content: The template could not be deleted.
error.title: Deletion error

help-tooltip.content:
This block represents a specific document or file that is dynamically created as part of your project. 
The document can be integrated as a variable in the text editor of various blocks to make it available to users.
help-tooltip.title: Document block

date.description: Allows users to enter a date.
date.name: Date

help-tooltip.content: You need the input name to reference an input as a variable.
help-tooltip.title: Input Name

help-tooltip.content: The label assigned here is used as a label for the input in the form.
help-tooltip.title: Label

help-tooltip.content: These elements represent different types of user input that you can query in your form.
help-tooltip.title: Inputs

multi-select.description: Allows users to choose multiple options from a predefined list.
multi-select.name: Multiple selection

number.description: Allows users to enter a numeric entry.

max.errorMessage: The value must be less than {maxValue}
max.label: Max

min.errorMessage: The value must be greater than {minValue}
min.label: Min

number.name: Number entry

rich-text.description: Allows users to enter formatted text such as lists and headings.
rich-text.name: Formatted text

select.description: Allows users to choose a single option from a predefined list.
select.name: Single selection

text.description: Allows users to enter a single line of text.
text.name: Text input

textarea.description: Allows users to enter multiple lines of text.
textarea.name: Text field

notification.content:
A maximum of {maxSelection} files can be selected. 
Please remove a file first.
notification.title: Maximum number of files reached

errors.too_short:
The subject is too short. 
It must be at least {minLength} characters long.

help-tooltip.content:
If this option is selected the text is formatted and can be used in other blocks. 
If it is not selected, the text will be output as unformatted text. 
The advantage of unformatted text is that it can be used in continuous text.
help-tooltip.title: Formatted text

error.content: An error has occurred during processing. Don't worry, your data has been saved up to this point. Please reload the version to try again. If the error occurs again, please contact support.

invalid_formular.content:
The configured formula could not be evaluated. 
Please check the mathematical correctness of your formula.
invalid_formular.title: Invalid formula

invalid_recipient.content: The email could not be sent because the recipient email address is invalid.
invalid_recipient.title: Invalid Recipient

later_date_before_earlier_date.content: The later date must be after the earlier date.
later_date_before_earlier_date.title: Incorrect Date Difference

missing_content.content: The email could not be sent because no content is configured.
missing_content.title: Missing content

missing_edges_for_node.content: This block has no connections and therefore cannot be executed further.
missing_edges_for_node.title: No connections

missing_recipient.content: The email could not be sent because no recipient is configured.
missing_recipient.title: Missing recipient

missing_subject.content: The email could not be sent because no subject was configured.
missing_subject.title: Missing subject

missing_template.content: The linked template could not be found.
missing_template.title: Missing template

missing_template_uuid.content: There is no template stored in the document block.
missing_template_uuid.title: Missing template

no_edge_matched.content:
A connection could not be made in block {blockName}. 
It may be that the variable is missing from one or more conditions. 
Check whether all relevant variables are queried and whether the queries are mandatory fields. 
To ensure that a connection can always run, you can set a connection as a fallback connection. 
You do this in the menu of a connection.
no_edge_matched.title: Connection error

no_meta_prompt.content:
No meta prompt has been configured for the AI. 
Please add a meta prompt.
no_meta_prompt.title: Missing meta prompt

template_not_found.content:
The linked template could not be found. 
Please update the template to restore the document block.
template_not_found.title: Template not found

error.title: Error

alert.description: Please confirm the deletion of the current data. This cannot be undone.
alert.title: Reset execution
